mapper.insert:
insert into zd_qkzlmba (SYSID, DH, MC, STATE, ZDLX, BM, F_CQJKWT, FCRB) values
(#{item.sysid}, #{item.dh}, #{item.mc}, #{item.state}, #{item.zdlx}, #{item.bm}, #{item.fCqjkwt}, #{item.fcrb})
mapper.update: update zd_qkzlmba set qybm = -1 where qybm != -1
create table ${tableName} as select * from zd_qkzlmba
mapper.delete: DELETE zd_qkzlmba FROM zd_qkzlmba INNER JOIN (SELECT mc, bm, zdlx, count(1) AS num, max(updated_at) AS maxupdated_at, max(SYSID) AS maxidformaxupdated_at FROM zd_qkzlmba q GROUP BY mc, bm, zdlx HAVING num > 1) AS duplicates ON zd_qkzlmba.mc = duplicates.mc AND duplicates.bm = zd_qkzlmba.bm AND duplicates.zdlx = zd_qkzlmba.zdlx WHERE zd_qkzlmba.updated_at != duplicates.maxupdated_at OR (zd_qkzlmba.updated_at = duplicates.maxupdated_at AND zd_qkzlmba.SYSID != duplicates.maxidformaxupdated_at)
